message:
changed: Version to BETA.
breaking: Replacing whole family of Web.Reuse.InRequest with single Reuse.InWebRequest located in DryIoc rather than extensions.
changed: DryIoc.Web to use existing WebScope if found istead of always creating new one.
changed: DryIoc.WebApi to use IAssemblyResolver and IHttpControllerTypeResolver.
added: Ext methods ContainerTools.WithAutoFallbackResolution and AutoRegisterUnknownServiceRule rule.
added: DryIoc.WebApi WithAutoFallbackResolution method.

--HG--
branch : dev

added: if (scopedContainer != null) // Use existing OWIN ScopeContainer for WebApi dependency resolver
